msg: Eliminated operation getPortletDescriptionList from the persistence mechanism

author: ayza
msg: java.awt.KeyboardFocusManagerRTest was added to Linux exclude lists since it fails on some Linux systems. Detailed investigation will be performed. (HARMONY-2493)

author: dlouzan
msg: - Eliminated operation not used on ProducerPersistentFactoryImpl
- Added mapping stubs for hibernate persistence

author: craigmcc
msg: [SHALE-374] Adjust the scope of the "recorder" bean from request to application
so that it can trace event firings across navigation requests.  In this way, we
can validate the correct behavior of destroy events by checking the value
rendered in the second view (which will now be cumulative).  This also required
resetting the recorder between each test run when the application is executed
All tests currently pass for shale-test-view ... now we need to do the same
kinds of changes for shale-test-tiger to validate destroy behavior there.
